snippet.title: Crystals of Time (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Coming soon for PC, MAC, IOS and ANDROID:
http://www.indiedb.com/games/crystals-of-time

Description:
Crystals of Time is an Adventure Hidden Object game with tons of puzzles, minigames and nice hand drawing scenes.The game takes you in control of Ashley Ford. Her father was a treasure hunter during day and a thief during night. She inherited her father's passion for treasures. She joined him during some of his travels ever since she was a child and knew how to get out of messy situations. Now, faced with the disappearance of her father, she ventures into the Three Oaks Mansion to find out what happened to him.

Features:
* Over 80 nice hand drawn scenes
* 24 minigames and ho scenes
* classic game play mechanics
* atmoshperic sound track
